content:
I was supposed to rehearse a scene with you,
But I accidentally forgot the script,
Gahahaha~ Looks like we'll have to do our scene together next time.

I was about to tell you something?
...
I... forgot, let me think about it.

Yeah yeah, that's right, that's...
That's... that's...
What was I going to say again?

Oh right, I wanted to talk to you... um...
What was I going to say?
Sorry, the thought just slipped right out of my mind.

I have something very important to tell you!
And that is—
I forgot what I was about to say!

Something just slipped away from my mind...
Let me think... It probably wasn't that important anyway.
I guess I just wanted to chat with you.
